Package ohos.sensor.bean

Class CategoryOrientation

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.sensor.bean.SensorBase
      • ohos.sensor.bean.CategoryOrientation

  • public final class CategoryOrientation
extends SensorBase
    Inherits from SensorBase and describes orientation sensors on hardware devices.

    This class describes the sensor types in the orientation category, such as the orientation type sensors, rotation vector sensors, and screen rotation sensors. It also provides the method for constructing a CategoryOrientation instance.

    Since:
    1
    See Also:
    SensorBase
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Sensors#SENSOR

    • Constructor Detail

      • CategoryOrientation

        public CategoryOrientation​(int sensorId,
                           String name,
                           String vendor,
                           int version,
                           float upperRange,
                           float resolution,
                           int flags,
                           int cacheMaxCount,
                           long minInterval,
                           long maxInterval)
        A constructor used to create a CategoryOrientation instance.
        Parameters:
        sensorId - Indicates the ID of the sensor.
        name - Indicates the name of the sensor.
        vendor - Indicates the manufacturer of the sensor.
        version - Indicates the version of the sensor.
        upperRange - Indicates the maximum measurement range of the sensor.
        resolution - Indicates the resolution of the sensor.
        flags - Indicates the flags of the sensor.
        cacheMaxCount - Indicates the maximum number of hardware FIFO elements supported by the sensor.
        minInterval - Indicates the minimum sampling interval of the sensor, in nanoseconds.
        maxInterval - Indicates the maximum sampling interval of the sensor, in nanoseconds.
        Since:
        1
